skt

Class BufferedSocketReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • skt.BufferedSocketReader

  • public class BufferedSocketReader
extends Object
    Read Message from socket input stream.

    If the splitGlobs flag is set, all MessageGlobs will be automatically split into their individual Messages before being returned through the calls read(), readAll(), and readHeartBeat().

    NOTE: Many HeartBeats will be contained in MessageGlobs during simulation. Make sure if you use the readHeartBeat() method during simulation, splitGlobs is true.

    Author:
    Kyle

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferedSocketReader

        public BufferedSocketReader(SocketStream stream,
                    boolean splitGlobs)
        Creates a BufferedSocketReader reading from stream, setting splitGlobs.

        Starts the SocketStream thread.

        Parameters:
        stream - the Socket stream
        splitGlobs - whether the BufferedSocketReader will automatically split MessageGlobs into their sub-Messages

        Creates a BufferedSocketReader reading from stream.

        Starts the SocketStream thread.

        Parameters:
        stream - the Socket stream

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public Message read()
             throws InterruptedException
        Reads the next Message from the SocketStream.

        Blocking call.

        Returns:
        the next Message from the SocketStream
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting

      • readAll

        public ArrayList<Message> readAll()
        Reads all pending Messages from the SocketStream.

        If no Messages are pending, blocks until at least one is available.

        Blocking call.

        Returns:
        the next Messages from the SocketStream

      • readHeartBeat

        public ArrayList<Message> readHeartBeat()
                                 throws InterruptedException
        Reads all pending Messages from the SocketStream up to and including the next HeartBeat.

        If no HeartBeats are pending, blocks until one is available.

        Blocking call.

        Returns:
        the next Messages from the SocketStream up to and including the next HeartBeat
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting

      • setSplitGlobs

        public void setSplitGlobs(boolean splitGlobs)
        Sets the value of splitGlobs.

        If splitGlobs = true automatically split MessageGlobs into individual Messages before sending through.

        Parameters:
        splitGlobs - the new value of splitGlobs

      • splitGlobs

        public boolean splitGlobs()
        Returns the value of splitGlobs.

        If splitGlobs = true automatically split MessageGlobs into individual Messages before sending through.

        Returns:
        the value of splitGlobs
